comments:
When working on JVEEVNT02 Testcase, openeing up the file CustomerInfoS2.java
didnt add many of the events. The following exceptions were being thrown. This
happened to all the files which the TestCase asked to open : AmortizationS2.java
and CustomerInfoS3.java.

Verified in RC2 - The events show up fine.
0.5.0 is out, so these are now closed.
